Service Details: - Encourages healthy lifestyles through weight-management support groups and food and exercise plans- Weekly meetings provide members with positive reinforcement and motivation in adhering to their food and exercise plans- New members should consult with their physician to obtain a goal weight
Meetings: Contact or view website (www.tops.org/tops/TOPS/FindAMeeting.aspx) for weekly meeting times and locations
